nodes.text: Spinefish were a species of animal from the planet Vodran in the Vodran system of the Si'Klaata Cluster in Hutt Space. They lived in the rivers of their homeworld alongside the predatory dianoga and were caught by the native sentient species, the Vodran. The spinefish were caught by the Vodran during a primitive stage of the sentients history, at a time when they lived above the rivers in suspended thatched huts from which they hung down nets to entangle the spinefish swimming below. This practice was continued until as late as around 25,100 BBY.

Spinefish were first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies an installment in the Galaxy Guide series of supplements for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, a roleplaying game produced by West End Games. The species were mentioned in the entry for the Vodran species which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
